author: ReferSMS Partner
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the National Creators Awards in New Delhi, recognizing talents across diverse fields and also interacting with winners. Engaging with winners, Modi lauded their contributions to societal progress and innovation. The ceremony celebrated creators' impactful endeavors, fostering creativity and driving India towards a brighter future.
title: PM interacts with winners of the first National Creators Award

author: The Hawk Editor
content: Yokohama's Chinatown celebrated the Lunar New Year with traditional dragon dances, highlighting Chinese and Japanese cultural unity. The event, rich in history and diversity, showcased the harmony between communities, with both locals and visitors enjoying the vibrant festivities in the heart of Yokohama.
title: Lunar new year festivities light up Yokohama's Chinatown

author: Udit Gupta
content: The makers of 'Shaitaan' organised a special screening in Mumbai, which was attended by several celebrities from the film industry. For the event, actor Jaideep Ahlawat donned a t-shirt that had a picture of late actor Irrfan Khan printed on it. The film, starring Ajay Devgn, R Madhavan and Jyotika, released on March 8.
title: Jaideep pays tribute to Irrfan, wears t-shirt with his picture

author: Subhash Kamble
content: Deshraj Poswal, the Kota city vice president of the BJP OBC Morcha, tragically died during a workout session at a gym. Doctors have preliminarily attributed his death to pulmonary embolism, a condition where a blood clot causes blockage in the lungsâ€™ arteries. He was known for his fitness and ability to perform stunts.
title: Deshraj Poswal collapses, dies while working out at gym

author: Atri Sanfui
content: Moeen Ali urged young players to persist with red-ball cricket for their betterment, even if they aspire to eventually specialise in limited-overs cricket. "The reason why there haven't been good leg spinners in Tests after Shane Warne is because they haven't played enough red-ball cricket," Moeen opined. "You have to play red-ball cricket to be a proper cricketer."
title: Moeen: You have to play red-ball cricket to be a proper cricketer

author: ReferSMS Partner
content: The team debuts the upbeat track, featuring Divyenndu, Pratik Gandhi, Avinash Tiwary, Nora Fatehi, Upendra Limaye, and Chhaya Kadam. Composed by Ajay-Atul, penned by Kumaar, and sung by Ajay Gogavale and Nikhita Gandhi. Directed by Kunal Kemmu, and produced by Ritesh Sidhwani and Farhan Akhtar. The film hits cinemas on March 22, 2024.
title: 'Madgaon Express' releases first song 'Baby Bring It On'

author: Shreyasi Banerjee
content: A video showing an injured cow being airlifted by a helicopter to reach the vet clinic in Switzerland has gone viral. A Swiss farmer reportedly chose to airlift his cow, which was limping, after fitting the animal with a harness. "I can't imagine being taken up in the air by strangers in a confusing situation," a social media user said.
title: Injured cow airlifted to vet clinic by helicopter in Switzerland; video goes viral

author: The Hawk Editor
content: A magnitude 6.0 earthquake struck Mindanao, Philippines, on March 8, 2024, at 14:41:47 IST, according to the National Centre for Seismology. With a depth of 140 km and coordinates at Lat: 5.81 & Long: 126.90, the tremors were widely felt. Authorities are monitoring the situation for any potential aftershocks or damage. Stay informed and prepared for updates.
title: Magnitude 6.0 earthquake hits Mindanao, Philippine

author: Shalini ojha
content: At the Content Creators' Award, when content creator Keerthika Govindhasamy tried to touch PM Narendra Modi's feet on stage he said it disturbs him when a daughter of the nation touches his feet. He said touching feet has become a tradition in politics but touching feet in the field of arts is different. She got the Best Storyteller Award.
title: It disturbs me: PM Modi as content creator Keerthika tries to touch his feet

author: Ashima Mahindra
content: Striving to breathe is among the most horrific conditions for anyone. "Air hunger" or breathlessness is a real medical issue that leaves sufferers feeling like they cannot take a full breath. Also known as dyspnea, the condition not only causes tightness in your chest but also makes you feel suffocated. It can be a symptom of various health conditions.
title: Suffering from air hunger? Know why do you get breathless
